creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: predominately black and red stripes continuing the length of the textile; three wide black stripes have geometric designs made of white glass beads; the geometric designs consist of "H", "X", and a diamond; shorter edge of textile has frayed tassels; some smaller green and yellow stripes; consists of two panels
title: Wrap skirt
